channel.title: 中文 on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in 中文 on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: 《长恨歌》
item.description: 从 Memory Reordering 说起 下面这段代码会有怎样的输出 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 var x, y int go func() { x = 1 // A1 fmt.Print("y:", y, " ") // A2 }() go func() { y = 1 // B1 fmt.Print("x:", x, " ") // B2 }() 显而易见的几种结果
